content: Smooth Shank Rebar Cutter Carbide tipped drill bit for cutting through rebar ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Concrete and masonry drill bits ### FEATURES:Features Rebar cutters have unique flute geometry with steep spiral removes debris fast Rebar cutters are made from high-quality carbide for long drilling life Rebar cutters have a relief hole that dissipates heat and allows for slug removal Shank extension extends the effective drilling depth by 6 Shank extension is designed for bits that are at least 1-3/4 in diameter Applications Drillbit specifically designed to cut through rebar ### TECHNICAL DATA: ### ITEMS- 3582034 - Rebar Cutter 1 X 12 - Package Size 1 pc - 3582028 - Rebar Cutter 1 1/2 X 12 - Package Size 1 pc - 3582027 - Rebar Cutter 1 1/4 X 12 - Package Size 1 pc - 3582026 - Rebar Cutter 1 1/8 X 12 - Package Size 1 pc - 3582029 - Rebar Cutter 1 3/4 X 12 - Package Size 1 pc - 3581892 - Rebar Cutter 1 3/8 X 12 - Package Size 1 pc - 3582024 - Rebar Cutter 1/2 X 12 - Package Size 1 pc - 3582037 - Rebar Cutter 11/16 X 12 - Package Size 1 pc - 3582035 - Rebar Cutter 13/16 X 12 - Package Size 1 pc - 3582030 - Rebar Cutter 2 X 12 - Package Size 1 pc - 3582031 - Rebar Cutter 2 1/2 X 12 - Package Size 1 pc - 3582039 - Extension Shank for Rebar Cutters - Package Size 1 pc - 3582036 - Rebar Cutter 3/4 X 12 - Package Size 1 pc - 3582038 - Rebar Cutter 3/4 X 18 - Package Size 1 pc - 3582023 - Rebar Cutter 3/8 X 8 - Package Size 1 pc - 3582033 - Rebar Cutter 5/8 X 12 - Package Size 1 pc - 3582032 - Rebar Cutter 7/8 X 12 - Package Size 1 pc - 3582025 - Rebar Cutter 9/16 X 12 - Package Size 1 pc
